release.action: ability to use models of Alfresco objects in your automation test
ability to create data users, tenant users
ability to create content as: files/folders in any location in repository via CMIS
ability to create data based on XML file (site structure). See XMLTestDataProvider.java
ability of asserting if particular extension point is installed ``` dataContent.assertExtensionAmpExists('artifact-id-of-extention-point') ```
ability to check the server health of Alfresco installed based only on IP and admin user provided.
ability to generate HtmlReports based on your TestNG test (just add HtmlReportListener listener)
ability to report test results into test tracker (TestRail used at thi point)
ability to document steps in your @Test using STEP helper (info are passed on test tracker too)
ability to annotate failing tests as @Bug (passing the jira id of the bug)
ability to define your alfresco test environment properties (server, credentials, etc.)
